name: Escape from Station 13
description:
Escape from Station 13 is a prototype  2d squad-based top-down horde shooter.

Your squad is trapped on board station 13 and must escape. The station is over-run with creatures who all want to eat you! Use your squads combined weaponry and special abilites to prevent being overun and get to the exit!

We would be really keen to hear any feedback related to - anything really - art, sound, gameplay, "gamefeel", concept, plotting, you name it!

We hope you enjoy playing this prototype and we look forward to hearing from you.
